titles.title: SF770 Amen siakudumisa., we praise your name O God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amen siakudumisa.
Amen siakudumisa.
Amen bawo, Amen bawo
Amen siakudumisa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amen, we praise your name O God
Amen, we praise your name O God
Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, we praise your name O God
